org.redkale.net

类 Server<K extends java.io.Serializable,C extends Context,R extends Request<C>,P extends Response<C,R>,S extends Servlet<C,R,P>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.redkale.net.Server<K,C,R,P,S>
  • 类型参数:
    K - 请求ID的数据类型， 例如HTTP协议请求标识为url，请求ID的数据类型就是String
    C - Context
    R - Request
    P - Response
    S - Servlet
    直接已知子类:
    HttpServer, SncpServer

    public abstract class Server<K extends java.io.Serializable,C extends Context,R extends Request<C>,P extends Response<C,R>,S extends Servlet<C,R,P>>
extends java.lang.Object

    详情见: http://redkale.org
